## Pull Request Checklist

- [ ] Tests: I ran affected test suites or documented why testing isn’t required.
- [ ] Migrations: Schema changes include an Alembic revision (`backend/app/alembic/versions`) and align with the onboarding checklist in `docs/progress/ci-migration-plan.md`.
- [ ] Documentation: Relevant handbook/guide updates are included for code changes.
- [ ] Release Tracker: I updated `docs/progress/release-readiness.md` or `docs/progress/dev-journal.md` if milestones advanced.
- [ ] CI: I verified the new workflow passes locally or understand expected failures.

### Summary
Provide a concise description of changes and impacted areas.

### Testing Evidence
List commands executed, screenshots, or links to CI runs.
